Icons

Icons design

We supports awesome iconic font: Fontello. If you want to add another icon provider — create new issue.

Icon without title

<vue-goodshare-facebook
  has_icon
></vue-goodshare-facebook>

Icon with title

<vue-goodshare-facebook
  title_social="Facebook"
  has_icon
></vue-goodshare-facebook>
